intro: Brachystelma edule, commonly known as the edible stonecrop, is a succulent plant native to southern Africa. Its leaves are thick and store water, while its flowers are often bright red or orange, attracting pollinators. Brachystelma edule is not only ornamental but also has historical uses in traditional medicine.
